Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2008 11:26PM gabbygail wrote: CBJ- I would definitely make sure your doctor understands how high your output still is.  75cc's is high in my opinion.  My PS would not pull the drains until my output was less than 20 in a 24 hour period.  I was told to keep the area around the drains clean with dial soap and water only, pat them dry, and then use a blowdryer on low setting to make sure the area was completely dry.  They didn't seem concerned about infection - I mean they told me what to watch for etc. but felt confident that if I followed their instructions it hopefully wouldn't become an issue.  I was told that if we pulled a drain too early, it would have to be put back in.  Your current output just seems like a lot of fluid to ask your body to reabsorb. Best of luck, Abby
